text: "More" is a 1990 song by The Sisters of Mercy. It is the leading single from their third studio album Vision Thing. It went to number 10 in Ireland, number 14 in Germany and the United Kingdom, number 41 in New Zealand and number 74 in Australia. It was covered by Meat Loaf in 2016. == Track listing== *"More" written by Andrew Eldritch and Jim Steinman, "You Could Be the One" written by Andreas Bruhn and Eldritch. title: More (The Sisters of Mercy song)
